.. _transformation:

#############################
Transformation
#############################

DAVE provides functions to create substations for each transformation level

.. autofunction:: dave_core.components.substations.create_hv_mv_substations
.. autofunction:: dave_core.components.substations.create_mv_lv_substations

Furthermore, the diffrent transformators can be generated

.. autofunction:: dave_core.components.transformers.create_ehv_hv_trafos
.. autofunction:: dave_core.components.transformers.create_hv_mv_trafos
.. autofunction:: dave_core.components.transformers.create_mv_lv_trafos
